title: 1.8很可能不会于8号放出= =
author: 猫前月下
txt_content:
Jeb recently mentioned that 1.8 will most likely not be released on September 8th, to allow time for more thorough testing and quality assurance.


你们这是闹哪样啊

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 坑爹啊

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content: 習慣就好... 反正都等那麼久了, 也沒差那幾天... 就再等吧...

replies.author: stephen_zou
replies.txt_content: 一声叹息~~~~

replies.author: ImnotSteve
replies.txt_content: 果然不会那么早的

replies.author: Jakob.z
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Jakob.z 于 2011-9-7 15:32 编辑 

你这信息是什么时候发出来的了?因为官网又发出一条9月10日将加入更多的动物智能,那是不是9月8日还得等?


1.8 Updates:  Animal Actions, Secret Stuff  
10 September 2011 - 01:28 AM

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content: 还是应该把notch打一顿

replies.txt_content: 尼玛的。。。。真坑爹

replies.txt_content: 他亦表示不會在9月9日推出

replies.txt_content: 早就知道了,吾預計大概9月尾.

replies.txt_content: 坑爹呀

replies.author: azusky
replies.txt_content: 希望中秋节能玩上1.8
瑞士玩家很多哦，要是闹一番的话估计会上央视，然后MC就会大举入侵中国，预计攻势并不会低于日本帝国入侵3省的攻势。

replies.txt_content:

遲點放有人駡,早放多bug有人駡

replies.txt_content:
nic148 发表于 2011-9-7 22:55

mojang團隊都很忙,尤其jeb,不停測試1.8
